test_series_metadata.title: JKSSB Junior Engineer (Electrical) - Complete Test Series
test_series_metadata.description: Comprehensive 600 MCQ questions across 5 full-length tests based on official syllabus

tests.description: Basic principles and fundamental concepts across all modules

tests.status: Sample questions provided - Framework for full generation

sample_questions.question_text: A 3-phase balanced load draws 10 kW at 0.8 power factor lagging from a 400V line. Calculate the line current.
sample_questions.explanation: For 3-phase: P = √3 × VL × IL × cosφ. Therefore, IL = P/(√3 × VL × cosφ) = 10000/(√3 × 400 × 0.8) = 18.04 A

sample_questions.question_text: A control system has open loop transfer function G(s) = 10/(s(s+2)). Find the steady state error for unit step input.
sample_questions.explanation: This is a Type 1 system (one pole at origin). For Type 1 systems, steady state error for step input is zero.

sample_questions.question_text: A PMMC ammeter has a resistance of 0.1Ω and full scale deflection of 1A. To measure 10A, what shunt resistance is required?
sample_questions.explanation: Shunt resistance Rs = Rm/(n-1) where n = 10/1 = 10. Rs = 0.1/(10-1) = 0.011Ω

sample_questions.question_text: A silicon diode has forward voltage drop of 0.7V. If it carries 2mA current, what is the dynamic resistance at room temperature?
sample_questions.explanation: Dynamic resistance rd = VT/I = 26mV/2mA = 13Ω at room temperature (VT = 26mV)

sample_questions.question_text: How many memory locations can be addressed by 8085 microprocessor with its 16-bit address bus?
sample_questions.explanation: With 16-bit address bus, 8085 can address 2^16 = 65536 = 64K memory locations
